read_next.why: If you're streamlining your Eleventy project with GitHub Actions, mastering how to manage multiple GitHub accounts with unique SSH keys on Linux could further enhance your workflow efficiency and security.

If you're all about optimizing your development workflow, just like you streamlined Eleventy deployment with GitHub Actions, you'll appreciate how I leveraged Jupyter notebooks in Hugo to make blogging a breeze.
After mastering GitHub Actions for your Eleventy project, you might be curious about leveraging APIs to automate other aspects of your digital presence, like fetching leads from Facebook with Python.
